title: Agricultural Technology Intern
description: Work on precision agriculture solutions using IoT sensors and data analytics. Assist in developing mobile applications for farmers and agricultural market platforms. Support research on sustainable farming practices and crop optimization.

title: Rural Development Intern
description: Support community development programs and rural livelihood initiatives. Assist in implementing government schemes and microfinance programs. Learn about social impact assessment and help coordinate with local stakeholders.

title: Smart Farming Intern
description: Implement IoT sensors and precision agriculture technologies to optimize crop yields and resource utilization. Work on automated irrigation systems and drone-based crop monitoring. Support farmers in adopting digital agriculture solutions and data-driven farming practices.

title: Organic Farming Intern
description: Support organic certification processes and sustainable farming practice implementation. Assist in soil health testing and natural pest management strategies. Learn about organic fertilizer production and crop rotation techniques.

title: Agricultural Finance Intern
description: Support rural lending programs and farmer financial literacy initiatives. Assist in crop insurance claim processing and microfinance operations. Learn about agricultural commodity trading and risk management strategies.

title: Food Processing Intern
description: Support food processing plant operations including quality control and packaging activities. Assist in new product development and shelf-life testing procedures. Learn about food safety regulations and HACCP implementation.

title: Dairy Technology Intern
description: Work on milk processing, quality testing, and dairy product development. Support cold chain management for dairy distribution networks. Assist in dairy farm management and cattle health monitoring systems.

title: Fisheries Management Intern
description: Support aquaculture operations and fish breeding programs. Assist in water quality monitoring and fish health management. Learn about sustainable fishing practices and marine conservation initiatives.
